alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Stone; Van Buren; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 24 at 4:22PM CDT until March 24 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Stone County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Perry County in central Arkansas... Southeastern Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... Cleburne County in north central Arkansas... Eastern Conway County in central Arkansas... Faulkner County in central Arkansas... West central White County in central Arkansas... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 421 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Catholic Point to near Mallet Town to near Toad Suck, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Conway... Heber Springs... Clinton... Fairfield Bay... Greenbrier... Greers Ferry... Wooster... Quitman... Guy... Rose Bud... Damascus... Enola... Twin Groves... Menifee... Shirley... Concord... Mount Vernon... Higden... Whipple... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Perry; Stone; Van Buren; White
